properties.entry: SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , FAQ_ENROLL_DATE , FAQ_MODIFY_DATE , FAQ_STATUS , MN_NO , FAQ_CATEGORY FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , MN_NO , FAQ_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( 'F-'||LPAD(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL,3,0) , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , FAQ_CATEGORY FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_TITLE = ? , FAQ_CONTENT = ? , FAQ_MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE , FAQ_CATEGORY = ? WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , FAQ_CATEGORY FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_TITLE LIKE ?
